name: Max Crowdfund
description: The Max Crowdfund Token (MCF) was created by Max Property Group. Max Crowdfund is an international real estate crowdfunding platform on blockchain technology and the first such platform to obtain regulatory approval from financial regulators in the Netherlands. The MCF Token pays out 5% of all transactions to liquidity pool providers and 1% of all transactions to all token holders. There is a buy-back and burn program where 0.1% of all investments made on all Max Crowdfund platforms will be used to buy back and burn MCF tokens until 50% has been burned. Max Crowdfund aims to be the biggest real estate crowdfunding platform in the world.
